description: Vitual Machine Metrics from Libvirt Exporter

panels.description: 虚拟机级别的内核上下文切换次数
panels.title: Context Switch

panels.description: 虚拟机的每指令周期数

targets.expr:
clamp_min(delta(libvirt_domain_perf_count{domain="podman-alpine317_default", instance="worknode:9177", job="libvirt_exporter", event="cpu_cycles"}[$__interval]), 0)
/on(domain)
clamp_min(delta(libvirt_domain_perf_count{domain="podman-alpine317_default", instance="worknode:9177", job="libvirt_exporter", event="instructions"}[$__interval]), 1)

panels.title: Cycle Per Instruction

panels.description: 虚拟机每秒执行指令数
panels.title: Instructions Per Second

panels.description: 虚拟机每千条指令预测失败比例，用于应用特征分析
panels.title: Branch Miss Per Branch Instructions

panels.description: 每千条指令的cache命中缺失次数
panels.title: Misses per Thousand Instructions

panels.description: 虚拟机内部内存利用率
panels.title: Usage

panels.description: Local Bandwidth from Intel RDT, MBps
panels.title: Bandwidth Local

panels.description: 当前内存刷新请求，反应内存cache情况
panels.title: flush request and time

panels.description: 磁盘扇区偏移，可以知道最近是否有落盘动作和每次罗盘多少比特
panels.title: sector offset

title: VM
